changeSet.id: Bug fix: Update password complexity regular expression
changeSet.sql: update os_cfg_settings s inner join os_cfg_props p on p.identifier = s.property_id inner join os_modules m on m.identifier = p.module_id set s.value = '((?=.*\\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z]).{8,20})' where m.name = 'auth' and p.name = 'password_pattern' and s.activity_status = 'Active';
